author: Monique Beals
title: Three shot dead at Afghan wedding during fight over music
description: Three people were fatally shot and 10 more were injured at a wedding in Afghanistan after an argument over whether music could be played.Residents said they recognized the gunmen as local Taliban members, ...
content:
Three people were fatally shot and 10 more were injured at a wedding in Afghanistan after an argument over whether music could be played. 
Residents said they recognized the gunmen as local Taliban … [+1017 chars]
